import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { FaBars, FaBell, FaUser, FaCog, FaSignOutAlt, FaChevronDown } from 'react-icons/fa'; const AdminNavbar = ({ onMenuClick, user, onLogout }) => { const [showUserMenu, setShowUserMenu] = useState(false); return (
{/* Left side */}

Admin Dashboard

{/* Right side */}
{/* Notifications */} {/* User menu */}
{/* Dropdown menu */} {showUserMenu && (

{user?.name || 'Admin'}

{user?.email || 'admin@hostel.com'}

Profile Settings
)}
); }; export default AdminNavbar;
